attributes.field_twig_content:
Welcome to your Archipelago Repository

{# drupal_block('views_exposed_filter_block:solr_search_content-page_1', wrapper=false) #}

Hello. If this is your first time using Archipelago we suggest you start reading our getting started guides and documentation and exploring some of the Demo Digital Objects we provided.

A lot can be customized, changed and improved via the UI. A good starting point is understanding the Adding/Editing Archipelago Digital Objects (ADOs) workflow and then go from there customizing your experience.

We hope you have fun. There is always our welcoming and caring community to help you out and answer any questions you will, for sure, have.
